title: China Vows To Develop Space Tourism, Explore Deep Space As It Races US
summary_full: China's main space contractor vowed to develop space tourism in the next five years, state media reported on Thursday, as Beijing revs up its commercial spaceflight and deep space exploration ambitions amid a technology race with the US.
